Name: Canva
Description: In May 2019, graphic design tool website Canva suffered a data breach that impacted 137 million subscribers. The exposed data included email addresses, usernames, names, cities of residence and passwords stored as bcrypt hashes for users not using social logins.

Name: eBay
Description: In May 2014, eBay was hacked and the data of 145 million users was exposed. The data included names, addresses, phone numbers, dates of birth, and encrypted passwords.
